member.name: P:LateNightStupidities.XorPersist.Properties.Exceptions.ClassAttributeMissingException
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The XorClass attribute is missing on type {0}. Add the attribute to the class declaration..

member.name: P:LateNightStupidities.XorPersist.Properties.Exceptions.CouldNotResolveReferenceException
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Could not resolve reference at '{0}'. Failed to find object with XorId '{1}'..

member.name: P:LateNightStupidities.XorPersist.Properties.Exceptions.CtorMissingException
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Parameterless constructor is missing on type {0}. XorPersist could not instantiate this class. Define a public parameterless constructor at this type. Alternatively, a method with the following signature that returns an instance of the type can be defined: "static object _XorCreate()"..

member.name: P:LateNightStupidities.XorPersist.Properties.Exceptions.DuplicateXorClassNameException
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Found duplicate XorClass name '{0}'. Type of existing entry: '{1}, Assembly <{3}>'. Type of duplicate entry: '{2}, Assembly <{4}>'..

member.name: P:LateNightStupidities.XorPersist.Properties.Exceptions.PropertyTypeNotSupportedException
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Property type ({0}) is not supported by XorPersist. Class: {1}. Class Property: {3}. XorPersist Property: {2}..

member.name: P:LateNightStupidities.XorPersist.Properties.Exceptions.PropertyTypeNotSupportedException2
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Property type ({0}) is not supported by XorPersist. Problem loading value from element '{1}'..

member.name: P:LateNightStupidities.XorPersist.Properties.Exceptions.SchemaValidationException
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The data does not conform to the XorPersist XML schema. Line {0}, Position {1}: {2}.
